data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Ngounié. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ngounié, Gabon
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Ngounié, Gabon to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 8 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Ngounié, Gabon that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Ngounié, Gabon be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Ngounié, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 107,200 people living in the state of Ngounié.
Spirit, please defend the 12,785 believers in Ngounié against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ngounié, Gabon has a population of 107,200.

We estimate Ngounié has 12,785 people who might know Jesus, 67,811 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 26,604 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.
